dcterms:creator: D. J. Watts
dcterms:description: The Communities dataset is generated by first producing 20 cliques of size 20 each and then generating an edge to connect with an adjacent clique. To introduce some randomness, cliques are connected using an edge with a probability of 0.01. Node-clique membership is used as the natural label for the node pair classification task.
dcterms:title: Communities

dcterms:creator: J. Leskovec
J. Kleinberg
C. Faloutsos
dcterms:description: The Email dataset is a collection of seven real-world email communication graphs with no node features. Each graph has six communities, and each node is labeled with the community it belongs to, which is used as the node pair classification label.
dcterms:title: Email

dcterms:creator: M. Zitnik
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: The PPI network contains 1113 nodes, each equipped with a 29-dimensional feature vector. Each node represents a protein, and an edge exists between two proteins if they interact with each other. The dataset is used for link prediction tasks.
dcterms:title: PPI
